name: Warcraft: Orcs & Humans
description: Play Warcraft 1 with Dosbox Linux version.
notes:
During install please let all options by default.

If you don't have music background at aim menu or during gaming, launch the setup program (option 2) and change the music sound card by a "Sound Blaster Pro II/SB 16".
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.

execute.command: cd $CACHE;mv CONFIG.WAR DOS4GW.EXE PATH.WAR PREFS.WAR README.TXT SETUP.EXE -t "$GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/"

content:
files:
- w1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/config/dosbox_warcraft.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "w1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/DRIVERS
    src: $CACHE/DRIVERS/
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/DATA
    src: $CACHE/DATA
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/config/
    src: $CACHE/__support/app/
- execute:
    command: mv $CACHE/W* "$GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/"
- execute:
    command: cd $CACHE;mv CONFIG.WAR DOS4GW.EXE PATH.WAR PREFS.WAR README.TXT SETUP.EXE
      -t "$GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/"
- execute:
    command: sed -i 's+..\WAR1.CUE+./WAR1.CUE+g' "$GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs
      & Humans/config/dosbox_warcraft_single.conf"
main_file: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/Warcraft Orcs & Humans/config/dosbox_warcraft_single.conf
